sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"> <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <includes/> <macroponent display_value="Order success">5e177aeb1e132110a598a48a4d78bb46</macroponent> <name>Refresh submitted screen</name> <preset/> <required_translations>[ ]</required_translations> <script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.event * @param {any} params.imports */ async function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) { let { table, sysId, number } = api.context.props; if(table !== "sc_request"){ api.setState("successNumber",number); api.setState("successSysId",sysId); }else{ api.setState("requestSysId",sysId); } }]]></script> <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version> <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-06-14 11:48:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>de177aeb66132110ca587178bc3c9447</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Refresh submitted screen</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Finder" source="x_350851_flow_fi_0">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Flow Finder">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_de177aeb66132110ca587178bc3c9447</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-14 11:48:12</sys_updated_on> <target/> <type/> </sys_ux_client_script> </record_update>
